name: Smash IT! (VSP Games)
description:
Smash IT!

*Smash and get fun!!
*Fun for kids, Children's!!
*Be the master of Smash IT!!
*Don't smash a bomb or a clock!!
*Top game for girls, woman get them happy :)
*Super easy to play just use one finger!!
*Download it while it free and have fun now!!



Check out the super smash IT game by VSP Games!

Your goal is very simple to get the higher score by smashing items that are fun to smash!

But make sure to you don't smash a bomb or a clock because in Smash IT! nothing is certain as long as you have hearts of life 🙂

You can earn coins and buy new bats! and we have some special ones for you!

New and fun experience for your whole family and also you can invite your friends from facebook and be the master of Smash IT and a living god amongst them!

Have Fun!

VSP Games
